definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to add oil/to top up with gas/to refuel/to accelerate/to step on the gas/(fig.) to make an extra effort/to cheer sb on

sentences.english: It is a preferred addictive for preparing over-based marine cylinder oil.
sentences.chinese: 是调制高碱值船用汽缸油的首选添加剂。

sentences.english: Combination oiled nubuck leather upper with textile fabric accents.
sentences.chinese: 结合上油纺织面料口音磨砂皮革鞋面。

sentences.english: Capsule valves longitudinally vittate to abaxially vittate with lateral vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 蒴果纵向裂片具油道到背面具油道具侧小泡。

sentences.english: High viscosity oils produce foam with small bubbles that do not break easily.
sentences.chinese: 高粘度油产生泡沫的小气泡，不容易突破。

sentences.english: Industrial machinery or to prevent oil pollution on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 工业上可防止机械或地面上的油污染。

sentences.english: and macromolecular clumps of organic material called kerogen.
sentences.chinese: 最后是一种叫做油母质的大分子化合物。

sentences.english: There was a thin curst of dirt around the bath.
sentences.chinese: 水面上浮有一层薄薄的油。

sentences.english: Flushing L. O. sytem of stern tube.
Flushing L. O. sytem of stern tube.
A smaller vehicle will consume less fuel.
sentences.chinese: 更小的汽车消耗更少的油。

sentences.english: We offer fully refined oil for cosmetic application which is pale yellow in colour and is almost odourless .
sentences.chinese: 我们为化妆品生产商提供纯精制的榛子油。

sentences.english: But the home of Kuang Heng be very poor, can not afford to buy light-on oil, how do?
sentences.chinese: 可是匡衡家里很穷，买不起点灯的油，怎么办呢？

sentences.english: The wind light cloud light green oil.
He smothers his hair with grease, eg hair-oil.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发因涂了油而发亮。

sentences.english: The other 5 percent is represented by supplemental plasticizers, motor oil and chemical marker.
sentences.chinese: 另外5%则是辅助可塑剂，马达油和化学标记物。
